definition: to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
to draw the outline of/to outline/to sketch/to delineate contours of/to give a brief account of
to collude with/to collaborate/(basketball) hook shot
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸
to fight and scheme against each other (idiom)/(in palace construction) elaborate and refined
to gang up/to fool around with/to make up to
to write off at one stroke

sentences.english: Tick the ones you have had.
sentences.chinese: 給你已經喫過的東西打上勾。

sentences.english: From a company's point of view, the earlier you hook your customers, the better.
sentences.chinese: 從商家的角度看，越早地勾上你的顧客越好。

sentences.english: Please put a tick against your name.
sentences.chinese: 請在你的名字下打一個勾。

sentences.english: First time, a girl and a boy, curved their little fingers and pulled a hook gently, under the curtain of night.
sentences.chinese: 一男一女真的在夜幕下第一次輕輕地用小手指拉了勾。

sentences.english: Check the box, Apply Changes, put in your password, and click close.
sentences.chinese: 打上勾，應用改變，輸入你的口令，最後點擊關閉。

sentences.english: The child has picked a hole in his new jumper.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在新毛衣上勾了一個洞。

sentences.english: If this option is not checked, then only a link pointing to the attachment will be stored.
sentences.chinese: 若未勾選此選項，則只會保留指向附檔的連結。

sentences.english: Pangu is the phonetic notation of Chinese characters to "Pangou" of Zhuang language.
sentences.chinese: 盤古是壯語“盤勾”的漢字記音。

sentences.english: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉筆在黑板上勾劃出一個圖樣。

sentences.english: It takes the edge off my hangover, kicks up the dust of last night’s drunk and gives it life.
sentences.chinese: 宿醉勾了起來，昨晚已經塵埃落定的醉意又煥發生機。

sentences.english: It's obvious that one sling was missed out by your tallyman .
sentences.chinese: 很明顯有一勾被你們的理貨員漏掉了。

sentences.english: Please tick if you are a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是素食者，請劃勾。

sentences.english: The teacher put a tick against the numbers that were correct.
sentences.chinese: 老師在正確的數字旁打上了勾。

sentences.english: Tick the names of the people who have accepted the invitation.
sentences.chinese: 在已接受邀請的人的姓名旁邊打上勾。

sentences.english: The child has picked a hole in his new jumper .
sentences.chinese: 孩子的新毛衣上勾了一個洞。

sentences.english: Then, straightened up, seize the pole hook up to mention.
sentences.chinese: 然後，直起身，抓住扁擔勾往上提。

definition: to delineate/to articulate/to evoke/to draw out/to tick off
to throw/to cast/left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)
to stick up/to rise on one end/to tilt
to lift/to raise/(of two or more persons) to carry
